title: Blood Razor Stupidity
body:
god damn so for the last 3 weeks Ive been playing Tahm in the jungle. each time coming out of it atleast 2 levels ahead with bloodrazor to thank. 
consistent damage that stacks with botrk and frees up 2 slots so i can build tank?... yes please.

Too see blood razor getting such a huge buff just becuase staple junglers can't use it effectively is kind of sickening. sure it couold of used the AS buff but the %damage buff is kind of over kill. yi shouldnt need that much extra damage and frankly it was a poor choice. we are going to be heading back to the same problems we had in season 2. Botrk running rampant with yi

replies.body: dont play tahm jg its garbage. when i used to play mid i found lux to be the most annoying champion ever to face, so i started playing her. here's my advice turn to the dark side play yi play bloodrazor champions and tilt others rather than sitting and complaining because  the champs you like to play dont fit the current meta.
